title.text: RFC 6022: YANG Module for NETCONF Monitoring

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                          M. Scott
Request for Comments: 6022                                      Ericsson
Category: Standards Track                                   M. Bjorklund
ISSN: 2070-1721                                           Tail-f Systems
                                                            October 2010
YANG Module for NETCONF Monitoring
contents.zh-CHS: 用于NETCONF监控的YANG模块

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document defines a Network Configuration Protocol (NETCONF) data model to be used to monitor the NETCONF protocol. The monitoring data model includes information about NETCONF datastores, sessions, locks, and statistics. This data facilitates the management of a NETCONF server. This document also defines methods for NETCONF clients to discover data models supported by a NETCONF server and defines a new NETCONF <get-schema> operation to retrieve them.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了一个网络配置协议（NETCONF）数据模型，用于监控NETCONF协议。监控数据模型包括有关NETCONF数据存储、会话、锁和统计信息。此数据有助于管理NETCONF服务器。本文档还定义了NETCONF客户端发现NETCONF服务器支持的数据模型的方法，并定义了一个新的NETCONF<get schema>操作来检索这些数据模型。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This is an Internet Standards Track document.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一份互联网标准跟踪文件。

contents.text: This document is a product of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). It represents the consensus of the IETF community. It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Further information on Internet Standards is available in Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。有关互联网标准的更多信息，请参见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6022.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc6022.

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document defines a YANG [RFC6020] model to be used to monitor the NETCONF protocol. It provides information about NETCONF sessions and supported schema as defined in [RFC4741].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了用于监控NETCONF协议的YANG[RFC6020]模型。它提供了有关NETCONF会话和[RFC4741]中定义的受支持模式的信息。

contents.text: Considerations such as different schema formats, feature optionality, and access controls can all impact the applicability and level of detail the NETCONF server sends to a client during session setup. The methods defined in this document address the need for further means to query and retrieve schema and NETCONF state information from a NETCONF server. These are provided to complement existing base NETCONF capabilities and operations and in no way affect existing behaviour.
contents.zh-CHS: 考虑因素（如不同的模式格式、功能可选性和访问控制）都会影响NETCONF服务器在会话设置期间发送给客户端的适用性和详细程度。本文中定义的方法解决了从NETCONF服务器查询和检索模式和NETCONF状态信息的进一步方法的需要。提供这些功能是为了补充现有的基本NETCONF功能和操作，并且不会影响现有的行为。

contents.text: A new <get-schema> operation is also defined to support explicit schema retrieval via NETCONF.
contents.zh-CHS: 还定义了一个新的<get schema>操作，以支持通过NETCONF进行显式模式检索。

contents.text: 1.1. Definition of Terms
contents.zh-CHS: 1.1. 术语的定义

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "NOT RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in BCP 14 [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“必需”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“不建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照BCP 14[RFC2119]中的说明进行解释。

contents.text: 2. Data Model to Monitor NETCONF
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 监视NETCONF的数据模型

contents.text: The NETCONF monitoring data model defined in this document provides operational information on the NETCONF server. This includes details specific to the NETCONF protocol (e.g., protocol-specific counters such as 'in-sessions') as well as data related to schema retrieval (e.g., schema list).
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中定义的NETCONF监控数据模型提供了NETCONF服务器上的操作信息。这包括特定于NETCONF协议的详细信息（例如，特定于协议的计数器，如“会话中”）以及与模式检索相关的数据（例如，模式列表）。

contents.text: A server that implements the data model defined in this document ("urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring") MUST advertise the capability URI as described in [RFC6020].
contents.zh-CHS: 实现本文档中定义的数据模型的服务器（“urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring”）必须按照[RFC6020]中所述公布功能URI。

contents.text: This section presents an overview of the monitoring data model. For detailed descriptions, refer to the normative YANG module provided in this document (see Section 5).
contents.zh-CHS: 本节概述了监控数据模型。有关详细说明，请参阅本文件中提供的标准模块（见第5节）。

contents.text: 2.1. The /netconf-state Subtree
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. /netconf状态子树

contents.text: The netconf-state container is the root of the monitoring data model.
contents.zh-CHS: netconf状态容器是监控数据模型的根。

contents.text:
netconf-state
    /capabilities
    /datastores
    /schemas
    /sessions
    /statistics
capabilities List of NETCONF capabilities supported by the server.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器支持的NETCONF功能列表。

contents.text: datastores List of NETCONF configuration datastores (e.g., running, startup, candidate) supported on this device and related information.
contents.zh-CHS: 数据存储此设备上支持的NETCONF配置数据存储列表（例如，运行、启动、候选）和相关信息。

contents.text: schemas List of schemas supported on the server. Includes all the information required to identify the schemas and to support their retrieval.
contents.zh-CHS: 架构服务器上支持的架构列表。包括标识架构和支持其检索所需的所有信息。

contents.text: sessions List of all active NETCONF sessions on the device. Includes per-session counters for all NETCONF sessions.
contents.zh-CHS: 设备上所有活动NETCONF会话的会话列表。包括所有NETCONF会话的每会话计数器。

contents.text: statistics Includes global counters for the NETCONF server.
contents.zh-CHS: 统计信息包括NETCONF服务器的全局计数器。

contents.text: 2.1.1. The /netconf-state/capabilities Subtree
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.1. /netconf state/capabilities子树

contents.text: The /netconf-state/capabilities subtree contains the capabilities supported by the NETCONF server. The list MUST include all capabilities exchanged during session setup still applicable at the time of the request.
contents.zh-CHS: /netconf state/capabilities子树包含netconf服务器支持的功能。该列表必须包括在会话设置期间交换的、在请求时仍然适用的所有功能。

contents.text: 2.1.2. The /netconf-state/datastores Subtree
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.2. /netconf state/datastores子树

contents.text: The /netconf-state/datastores subtree contains the list of available datastores for the NETCONF server and includes information on their lock state.
contents.zh-CHS: /netconf state/datastores子树包含netconf服务器可用数据存储的列表，并包含有关其锁定状态的信息。

contents.text: datastore /name /locks
contents.zh-CHS: 数据存储/名称/锁

contents.text: name (leaf, netconf-datastore-type) Enumeration of supported datastores; candidate, running, startup.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持的数据存储的名称（leaf、netconf数据存储类型）枚举；候选、运行、启动。

contents.text: locks (grouping, lock-info) List of locks for the datastore. Information is provided for both global and partial locks [RFC5717]. For partial locks, the list of locked nodes and the select expressions originally used to request the lock are returned.
contents.zh-CHS: 锁（分组，锁信息）数据存储的锁列表。提供了全局锁和部分锁的信息[RFC5717]。对于部分锁定，将返回锁定节点的列表和最初用于请求锁定的select表达式。

contents.text: 2.1.3. The /netconf-state/schemas Subtree
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.3. /netconf state/schemas子树

contents.text: The list of supported schema for the NETCONF server.
contents.zh-CHS: NETCONF服务器支持的架构列表。

contents.text:
schema
    /identifier   (key)
    /version      (key)
    /format       (key)
    /namespace
    /location
The elements identifier, version, and format are used as a key in the schema list. These are used in the <get-schema> operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 元素标识符、版本和格式用作模式列表中的键。这些用于<get schema>操作。

contents.text: identifier (string) Identifier for the schema list entry. The identifier is used in the <get-schema> operation and may be used for other means such as file retrieval.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识符（字符串）架构列表项的标识符。标识符用于<get schema>操作，并可用于其他方式，如文件检索。

contents.text: version (string) Version of the schema supported. Multiple versions MAY be supported simultaneously by a NETCONF server. Each version MUST be reported individually in the schema list, i.e., with same identifier, possibly different location, but different version.
contents.zh-CHS: 支持的架构的版本（字符串）。NETCONF服务器可能同时支持多个版本。每个版本必须在模式列表中单独报告，即使用相同的标识符，可能不同的位置，但版本不同。

contents.text: For YANG data models, version is the value of the most recent YANG 'revision' statement in the module or submodule, or the empty string if no 'revision' statement is present.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于YANG数据模型，version是模块或子模块中最新YANG“revision”语句的值，如果不存在“revision”语句，则为空字符串。

contents.text: format (identifyref, schema-format) The data modeling language the schema is written in. The data modeling language is represented as a YANG identity. This document defines the identities "xsd", "yang", "yin", "rng", and "rnc" (see Section 5).
contents.zh-CHS: format（identifyref，schema format）编写模式所用的数据建模语言。数据建模语言表示为YANG标识。本文件定义了标识“xsd”、“阳”、“阴”、“rng”和“rnc”（见第5节）。

contents.text: namespace (inet:uri) The Extensible Markup Language (XML) namespace [XML-NAMES] defined by the schema.
contents.zh-CHS: 名称空间（inet:uri）由模式定义的可扩展标记语言（XML）名称空间[XML-NAMES]。

contents.text: location (union: enum, inet:uri) One or more locations from which this specific schema can be retrieved. The list SHOULD contain at least one entry per schema.
contents.zh-CHS: 位置（union:enum，inet:uri）可以从中检索此特定架构的一个或多个位置。每个架构的列表应至少包含一个条目。

contents.text: 2.1.4. The /netconf-state/sessions Subtree
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.4. /netconf state/sessions子树

contents.text: Includes session-specific data for NETCONF management sessions. The session list MUST include all currently active NETCONF sessions.
contents.zh-CHS: 包括NETCONF管理会话的特定于会话的数据。会话列表必须包括所有当前活动的NETCONF会话。

contents.text:
session
    /session-id (key)
    /transport
    /username
    /source-host
    /login-time
    /in-rpcs
    /in-bad-rpcs
    /out-rpc-errors
    /out-notifications
session-id (uint32, 1..max) Unique identifier for the session. This value is the NETCONF session identifier, as defined in [RFC4741].
contents.zh-CHS: 会话id（uint32，1..max）会话的唯一标识符。该值是[RFC4741]中定义的NETCONF会话标识符。

contents.text: transport (identityref, transport) Identifies the transport for each session. The transport is represented as a YANG identity. This document defines the identities "netconf-ssh", "netconf-soap-over-beep", "netconf-soap-over-https", "netconf-beep", and "netconf-tls" (see Section 5).
contents.zh-CHS: 传输（identityref，transport）标识每个会话的传输。传输被表示为杨标识。本文档定义了标识“netconf-ssh”、“netconf-soap-over-beep”、“netconf-soap-over-https”、“netconf-beep”和“netconf-tls”（参见第5节）。

contents.text: username (string) The username is the client identity that was authenticated by the NETCONF transport protocol. The algorithm used to derive the username is NETCONF transport protocol specific and in addition specific to the authentication mechanism used by the NETCONF transport protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户名（字符串）用户名是由NETCONF传输协议验证的客户端标识。用于派生用户名的算法特定于NETCONF传输协议，并且特定于NETCONF传输协议使用的身份验证机制。

contents.text: source-host (inet:host) Host identifier (IP address or name) of the NETCONF client.
contents.zh-CHS: NETCONF客户端的源主机（inet:host）主机标识符（IP地址或名称）。

contents.text: login-time (yang:date-and-time) Time at the server at which the session was established.
contents.zh-CHS: 在建立会话的服务器上的登录时间（yang:日期和时间）。

contents.text: in-rpcs (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of correct <rpc> messages received.
contents.zh-CHS: 在rpc（yang:zero-based-counter32）中，接收到的正确<rpc>消息数。

contents.text: in-bad-rpcs (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of messages received when an <rpc> message was expected, that were not correct <rpc> messages. This includes XML parse errors and errors on the rpc layer.
contents.zh-CHS: 在坏rpc（yang:zero-based-counter32）中，当预期出现<rpc>消息时，收到的不正确的<rpc>消息数。这包括XML解析错误和rpc层上的错误。

contents.text: out-rpc-errors (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of <rpc-reply> messages sent that contained an <rpc-error> element.
contents.zh-CHS: out rpc errors（yang:zero-based-counter32）发送的包含<rpc error>元素的<rpc reply>消息数。

contents.text: out-notifications (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of <notification> messages sent.
contents.zh-CHS: out通知（yang:zero-based-counter32）发送的<notification>消息数。

contents.text: 2.1.5. The /netconf-state/statistics Subtree
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1.5. /netconf state/statistics子树

contents.text: Statistical data pertaining to the NETCONF server.
contents.zh-CHS: 与NETCONF服务器有关的统计数据。

contents.text:
statistics
    /netconf-start-time
    /in-bad-hellos
    /in-sessions
    /dropped-sessions
    /in-rpcs
    /in-bad-rpcs
    /out-rpc-errors
    /out-notifications
statistics: Contains management-session-related performance data for the NETCONF server.
contents.zh-CHS: 统计信息：包含NETCONF服务器的管理会话相关性能数据。

contents.text: netconf-start-time (yang:date-and-time) Date and time at which the management subsystem was started.
contents.zh-CHS: netconf启动时间（yang:date and time）管理子系统启动的日期和时间。

contents.text: in-bad-hellos (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of sessions silently dropped because an invalid <hello> message was received.
contents.zh-CHS: 在bad hellos（yang:zero-based-counter32）中，由于收到无效的<hello>消息而静默丢弃的会话数。

contents.text: in-sessions (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of sessions started.
contents.zh-CHS: 在会话中（yang:zero-based-counter32）启动的会话数。

contents.text: dropped-sessions (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of sessions that were abnormally terminated, e.g., due to idle timeout or transport close.
contents.zh-CHS: 丢弃的会话（yang:zero-based-counter32）由于空闲超时或传输关闭等原因而异常终止的会话数。

contents.text: in-rpcs (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of correct <rpc> messages received.
contents.zh-CHS: 在rpc（yang:zero-based-counter32）中，接收到的正确<rpc>消息数。

contents.text: in-bad-rpcs (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of messages received when an <rpc> message was expected, which were not correct <rpc> messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 在坏rpc（yang:zero-based-counter32）中，当预期出现<rpc>消息时收到的消息数，这些消息不正确<rpc>消息。

contents.text: out-rpc-errors (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of <rpc-reply> messages sent that contained an <rpc-error> element.
contents.zh-CHS: out rpc errors（yang:zero-based-counter32）发送的包含<rpc error>元素的<rpc reply>消息数。

contents.text: out-notifications (yang:zero-based-counter32) Number of <notification> messages sent.
contents.zh-CHS: out通知（yang:zero-based-counter32）发送的<notification>消息数。

contents.text: 3. Schema Specific Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 特定于模式的操作

contents.text: 3.1. The <get-schema> Operation
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. <get schema>操作

contents.text: Description:
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：

contents.text: This operation is used to retrieve a schema from the NETCONF server.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作用于从NETCONF服务器检索架构。

contents.text: Parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: 参数：

contents.text: identifier (string): Identifier for the schema list entry. Mandatory parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 标识符（字符串）：架构列表项的标识符。强制参数。

contents.text: version (string): Version of the schema requested. Optional parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: 版本（字符串）：请求的架构的版本。可选参数。

contents.text: format (identityref, schema-format): The data modeling language of the schema. Default value is 'yang' when not specified. Optional parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: format（identityref，schema format）：模式的数据建模语言。未指定时，默认值为“yang”。可选参数。

contents.text: Positive Response:
contents.zh-CHS: 积极回应：

contents.text: The NETCONF server returns the requested schema.
contents.zh-CHS: NETCONF服务器返回请求的架构。

contents.text: Negative Response:
contents.zh-CHS: 否定回答：

contents.text: If the requested schema does not exist, the <error-tag> is 'invalid-value'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果请求的架构不存在，<error tag>为“无效值”。

contents.text: If more than one schema matches the requested parameters, the <error-tag> is 'operation-failed', and <error-app-tag> is 'data-not-unique'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果有多个架构与请求的参数匹配，则<error tag>为“操作失败”，而<error app tag>为“数据不唯一”。

contents.text: 4. Examples
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 例子

contents.text: 4.1. Retrieving Schema List via <get> Operation
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 通过<get>操作检索架构列表

contents.text: A NETCONF client retrieves the list of supported schema from a NETCONF server by retrieving the /netconf-state/schemas subtree via a <get> operation.
contents.zh-CHS: NETCONF客户端通过<get>操作检索/NETCONF state/schemas子树，从NETCONF服务器检索支持的模式列表。

contents.text: Available schema for the requesting session are returned in the reply containing the <identifier>, <version>, <format>, and <location> elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求会话的可用架构在包含<identifier>、<version>、<format>和<location>元素的应答中返回。

contents.text: The response data can be used to determine the available schema and their versions. The schema itself (i.e., schema content) is not returned in the response. The optional <location> element contains a URI, which can be used to retrieve the schema by another protocol such as ftp [RFC0959] or http(s) [RFC2616] [RFC2818], or the special value 'NETCONF', which means that the schema can be retrieved from the device via the <get-schema> operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应数据可用于确定可用的模式及其版本。响应中不返回模式本身（即模式内容）。可选的<location>元素包含一个URI，该URI可用于通过另一个协议（如ftp[RFC0959]或http[RFC2616][RFC2818]或特殊值“NETCONF”）检索架构，这意味着可以通过<get schema>操作从设备检索架构。

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text:
<rpc message-id="101"
     xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <get>
    <filter type="subtree">
      <netconf-state xmlns=
      "urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
        <schemas/>
      </netconf-state>
    </filter>
  </get>
</rpc>
The NETCONF server returns a list of schema available for retrieval.
contents.zh-CHS: NETCONF服务器返回可供检索的架构列表。

contents.text:
<rpc-reply message-id="101"
           xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <data>
    <netconf-state
    xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
      <schemas>
        <schema>
          <identifier>foo</identifier>
          <version>1.0</version>
          <format>xsd</format>
          <namespace>http://example.com/foo</namespace>
          <location>ftp://ftp.example.com/schemas/foo_1.0.xsd</location>
          <location>http://www.example.com/schema/foo_1.0.xsd</location>
          <location>NETCONF</location>
        </schema>
        <schema>
          <identifier>foo</identifier>
          <version>1.1</version>
          <format>xsd</format>
          <namespace>http://example.com/foo</namespace>
          <location>ftp://ftp.example.com/schemas/foo_1.1.xsd</location>
          <location>http://www.example.com/schema/foo_1.1.xsd</location>
          <location>NETCONF</location>
        </schema>
        <schema>
          <identifier>bar</identifier>
          <version>2008-06-01</version>
          <format>yang</format>
          <namespace>http://example.com/bar</namespace>
          <location>
            http://example.com/schema/bar@2008-06-01.yang
          </location>
          <location>NETCONF</location>
        </schema>
        <schema>
          <identifier>bar-types</identifier>
          <version>2008-06-01</version>
          <format>yang</format>
          <namespace>http://example.com/bar</namespace>
          <location>
            http://example.com/schema/bar-types@2008-06-01.yang
          </location>
          <location>NETCONF</location>
        </schema>
      </schemas>
    </netconf-state>
  </data>
</rpc-reply>
4.2. Retrieving Schema Instances
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 检索架构实例

contents.text: Given the reply in the previous section, the following examples illustrate the retrieval of 'foo', 'bar', and 'bar-types' schema at multiple locations, with multiple formats, and in multiple locations.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据上一节中的回答，以下示例说明了在多个位置、多个格式和多个位置检索“foo”、“bar”和“bar type”模式。

contents.text: 1. foo, version 1.0 in xsd format:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. foo，xsd格式的1.0版：

contents.text:
a.  Via FTP using location
    ftp://ftp.example.com/schemas/foo_1.0.xsd

b.  Via HTTP using location
    http://www.example.com/schema/foo_1.0.xsd
c. Via <get-schema> using identifier, version, and format parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: c. 使用标识符、版本和格式参数通过<get schema>。

contents.text:
<rpc message-id="101"
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <get-schema
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
    <identifier>foo</identifier>
    <version>1.0</version>
    <format>xsd</format>
  </get-schema>
</rpc>

<rpc-reply message-id="101"
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <data
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
    <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
      <!-- foo 1.0 xsd schema contents here -->
    </xs:schema>
  </data>
</rpc-reply>
2. bar, version 2008-06-01 in YANG format:

a.  Via HTTP using location
    http://example.com/schema/bar@2008-06-01.yang
b. Via <get-schema> using identifier and version parameters:
contents.zh-CHS: b. 使用标识符和版本参数通过<get schema>：

contents.text:
<rpc message-id="102"
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <get-schema
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
    <identifer>bar</identifer>
    <version>2008-06-01</version>
  </get-schema>
</rpc>

<rpc-reply message-id="102"
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <data
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
    module bar {
      //default format (yang) returned
      //bar version 2008-06-01 yang module
      //contents here ...
    }
  </data>
</rpc-reply>
3. bar-types, version 2008-06-01 in default YANG format:
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 条形图类型，版本2008-06-01，默认格式：

contents.text: a. Via <get-schema> using identifer parameter:
contents.zh-CHS: a. 使用identifer参数通过<get schema>：

contents.text:
<rpc message-id="103"
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <get-schema
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
    <identifer>bar-types</identifer>
  </get-schema>
</rpc>

<rpc-reply message-id="103"
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:netconf:base:1.0">
  <data
  xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring">
    module bar-types {
      //default format (yang) returned
      //latest revision returned
      //is version 2008-06-01 yang module
      //contents here ...
    }
  </data>
</rpc-reply>
5. NETCONF Monitoring Data Model
contents.zh-CHS: 5. NETCONF监控数据模型

contents.text: The data model described in this memo is defined in the following YANG module.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录中描述的数据模型在以下模块中定义。

contents.text: This YANG module imports typedefs from [RFC6021] and references [RFC4741], [RFC4742], [RFC4743], [RFC4744], [RFC5539], [xmlschema-1], [RFC6020], [ISO/IEC19757-2:2008], and [RFC5717].
contents.zh-CHS: 此模块从[RFC6021]和参考[RFC4741]、[RFC4742]、[RFC4743]、[RFC4744]、[RFC5539]、[xmlschema-1]、[RFC6020]、[ISO/IEC19757-2:2008]和[RFC5717]导入TypeDef。

contents.text: <CODE BEGINS> file "ietf-netconf-monitoring@2010-10-04.yang"
module ietf-netconf-monitoring {
contents.zh-CHS: ietf netconf监控模块{

contents.text:
namespace "urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring";
prefix "ncm";

import ietf-yang-types { prefix yang; }
import ietf-inet-types { prefix inet; }
organization "IETF NETCONF (Network Configuration) Working Group";
contents.zh-CHS: 组织“IETF网络配置工作组”；

contents.text:
contact
  "WG Web:   <http://tools.ietf.org/wg/netconf/>
   WG List:  <mailto:netconf@ietf.org>

WG Chair: Mehmet Ersue
          <mailto:mehmet.ersue@nsn.com>

WG Chair: Bert Wijnen
          <mailto:bertietf@bwijnen.net>

Editor:   Mark Scott
          <mailto:mark.scott@ericsson.com>

Editor:   Martin Bjorklund
          <mailto:mbj@tail-f.com>";
description "NETCONF Monitoring Module. All elements in this module are read-only.
contents.zh-CHS: description“NETCONF监控模块。此模块中的所有元素都是只读的。

contents.text: Copyright (c) 2010 IETF Trust and the persons identified as authors of the code. All rights reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（c）2010 IETF信托基金和被确定为代码作者的人员。版权所有。

contents.text: Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, is permitted pursuant to, and subject to the license terms contained in, the Simplified BSD
contents.zh-CHS: 根据简化BSD中包含的许可条款，允许以源代码和二进制格式重新分发和使用，无论是否进行修改

contents.text: License set forth in Section 4.c of the IETF Trust's Legal Provisions Relating to IETF Documents (http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info).
contents.zh-CHS: IETF信托法律条款第4.c节中规定的与IETF文件相关的许可证(http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info).

contents.text: This version of this YANG module is part of RFC 6022; see the RFC itself for full legal notices.";
contents.zh-CHS: 该模块的此版本是RFC 6022的一部分；有关完整的法律通知，请参见RFC本身。“；

contents.text:
leaf name {
  type netconf-datastore-type;

Monitoring information is provided for each datastore entry including details such as the session that acquired the lock, the type of lock (global or partial) and the list of locked resources. Multiple locks per datastore are supported.";
contents.zh-CHS: 为每个数据存储条目提供监控信息，包括获取锁的会话、锁的类型（全局或部分）和锁定资源列表等详细信息。每个数据存储支持多个锁。“；

contents.text:
list schema {
  key "identifier version format";
description "List of data model schemas supported by the server.";
contents.zh-CHS: description“服务器支持的数据模型架构列表。”；

contents.text:
For modeling languages that support or require a data
     model name (e.g., YANG module name) the identifier MUST
     match that name.  For YANG data models, the identifier is
     the name of the module or submodule.  In other cases, an
     identifier such as a filename MAY be used instead.";
}
leaf version {
  type string;
  description
    "Version of the schema supported.  Multiple versions MAY be
     supported simultaneously by a NETCONF server.  Each
     version MUST be reported individually in the schema list,
     i.e., with same identifier, possibly different location,
     but different version.
rpc get-schema { description "This operation is used to retrieve a schema from the NETCONF server.
contents.zh-CHS: rpc get schema{description“此操作用于从NETCONF服务器检索架构。

contents.text: Positive Response: The NETCONF server returns the requested schema.
contents.zh-CHS: 肯定响应：NETCONF服务器返回请求的架构。

contents.text: Negative Response: If requested schema does not exist, the <error-tag> is 'invalid-value'.
contents.zh-CHS: 否定响应：如果请求的架构不存在，<error tag>为“无效值”。

contents.text: <CODE ENDS>
contents.zh-CHS: <代码结束>

contents.text: 6. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 安全考虑

contents.text: The YANG module defined in this memo is designed to be accessed via the NETCONF protocol [RFC4741]. The lowest NETCONF layer is the secure transport layer and the mandatory to implement secure transport is SSH [RFC4742].
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录中定义的模块旨在通过NETCONF协议[RFC4741]访问。最低的NETCONF层是安全传输层，实现安全传输的必需层是SSH[RFC4742]。

contents.text: Some of the readable data nodes in this YANG module may be considered sensitive or vulnerable in some network environments. It is thus important to control read access (e.g., via get, get-config, or notification) to these data nodes.
contents.zh-CHS: 在某些网络环境中，此模块中的某些可读数据节点可能被视为敏感或易受攻击。因此，控制对这些数据节点的读取访问（例如，通过get、get config或通知）非常重要。

contents.text: These are the containers, list nodes, and data nodes with their specific sensitivity/vulnerability:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是容器、列表节点和数据节点及其特定的敏感度/漏洞：

contents.text: /netconf-state/sessions/session/username: Contains identity information that could be used in an attempt to authenticate with the server.
contents.zh-CHS: /netconf state/sessions/session/username:包含可用于尝试向服务器进行身份验证的标识信息。

contents.text: This username is only meant for monitoring, and SHOULD NOT be used for other purposes, such as access control, without a detailed discussion of the limitations of this reported username. For example, it is possible that server A and server B might report the same username, but these might be for different persons.
contents.zh-CHS: 此用户名仅用于监视，不应用于其他目的，如访问控制，除非详细讨论此报告用户名的限制。例如，服务器A和服务器B可能报告相同的用户名，但可能是针对不同的人。

contents.text: 7. Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 致谢

contents.text: The authors would like to thank Andy Bierman, Mehmet Ersue, Washam Fan, David Harrington, Balazs Lengyel, Hideki Okita, Juergen Schoenwaelder, Bert Wijnen, and many other members of the NETCONF WG for providing important input to this document. The authors would also like to specifically acknowledge Sharon Chisholm's work on "NETCONF Monitoring Schema" [NETCONF] and contribution to this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 作者要感谢Andy Bierman、Mehmet Ersue、Washam Fan、David Harrington、Balazs Lengyel、Hideki Okita、Juergen Schoenwaeld、Bert Wijnen和NETCONF工作组的许多其他成员为本文件提供了重要投入。作者还想特别感谢Sharon Chisholm在“NETCONF监控模式”[NETCONF]方面的工作以及对本文件的贡献。

contents.text: 8. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. IANA考虑

contents.text: This document registers one URI in "The IETF XML Registry". Following the format in [RFC3688], the following has been registered.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档在“IETF XML注册表”中注册了一个URI。按照[RFC3688]中的格式，已注册以下内容。

contents.text: URI: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring Registrant Contact: The IESG. XML: N/A, the requested URI is an XML namespace.
contents.zh-CHS: URI:urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf监控注册人联系人：IESG。XML:N/A，请求的URI是一个XML名称空间。

contents.text: This document registers one module in the "YANG Module Names" registry. Following the format in [RFC6020], the following has been registered.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件在“YANG模块名称”注册表中注册了一个模块。按照[RFC6020]中的格式，已注册以下内容。

contents.text:
name: ietf-netconf-monitoring
namespace: urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:yang:ietf-netconf-monitoring
prefix: ncm
reference: RFC 6022
